name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: YouTube Ad Accelerator & Easy Speed Drag

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Speed up YouTube Ads by 16x, and control the speed of YouTube videos by clicking & dragging left/right anywhere on the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
âœ… YouTube Ads will be accelerated & skipped automatically

------------------------------
PLEASE READ IN REGARDS TO AD-SKIPPING:

This extension can still skip video ads, even after YouTube's recent update (October 2024).

Since the ads aren't technically "blocked", it bypasses most of YouTube's Anti-Ad-Block measures.

There is one type of ad which must be skipped manually - it is rarer, but if you get that type of ad, this extension will make the "Skip" button the size of the entire video for you, making it super easy to click.

------------------------------
-

YouTube Speed Controls:
------
â© Click and hold anywhere on a video to play at 2x speed while the click is held down

â¡ï¸ Drag right for faster speeds
â¬…ï¸ Drag left for slower speeds

ğŸ”¼ Release the click to return to normal speed
â¬‡ï¸ Or, drag down before releasing to continue watching at that speed



YouTube AdBlock Features: 
------
âš¡Auto Ad Speed-Up - YouTube ads are fast-forwarded at 16x speed 
ğŸ‘‡ Auto Ad Skip - The skip button is pressed the second it appears to skip the ad as soon as possible
ğŸ™ˆ Disappearing Ads -  In total, YouTube ads are skipped and disappear in less than half a second
ğŸš« Not Actually Ad-Block - since this doesn't technically block the ads, YouTube still thinks you are watching them, which gets around many of YouTube's anti-Ad Block features



YouTube Speed Control Features: 
------
â­ï¸ Skim Over The Boring Stuff - Quickly skim over boring or sponsored content
ğŸ‘Œ Set The Perfect Speed -  By far the easiest way to change speed settings on YouTube
ğŸ›ï¸ Customize To Your Tastes - Set custom speed levels you prefer in the menu, anywhere from 0.1x to 16x (full range that YouTube supports for speed control)
ğŸ§  Incredibly Intuitive - Works exactly how you expect it to work
ğŸ¥· Never In Your Way - Adds speed control features but does not interfere with any native YouTube features



Hotkeys For YouTube Speed Control : 
------
ğŸ”¬ Micro Speed Adjustments - Tap comma or period to adjust the speed up or down by 5%
ğŸ‘‡ Hold - Hold down either hotkey to play at the custom speed you selected in the settings
â© Double - Tap-hold to play at twice the custom video speed you selected in the settings (so if you've selected 5x speed, double-tap-hold will play the video at 10x)


What Else?
-
âœ… Works on embedded youtube videos
âœ… Minimal Permissions
âœ… No data collection
âœ… No ads or monetization

YouTube-snelheidsregelingen:
------
â© Klik en houd vast op een willekeurige plek in een YouTube-video om af te spelen op 2x snelheid

â¬…ï¸ Sleep naar links voor lagere snelheden

YouTube AdBlock-functies:
------
âš¡Automatisch Versnellen - YouTube-advertenties worden versneld met 16x snelheid
ğŸ‘‡ Automatisch Overslaan - De overslaanknop wordt ingedrukt zodra deze verschijnt
ğŸ™ˆ Verdwijnende Advertenties - In totaal duren YouTube-advertenties minder dan een halve seconde voordat ze verdwijnen

------
